languages.text: {n}Обрюзгший мужчина в потрепанной одежде грустно вздыхает над стаканом мутного пойла. Только когда он поднимает взгляд на вас, становится видно, какие у него большие, внимательные и очень печальные глаза, резко контрастирующие с неопрятным внешним видом.{/n} "Неужели кто-то хочет составить мне компанию?"

{n}The flabby man in worn clothes is sighing sadly over a glass of murky booze. Only when he looks up at you do you notice his eyes — large, piercing, and full of sorrow, a stark contrast to his unkempt appearance.{/n} "Could it be that someone actually wishes to keep me company?"
languages.original_text: {n}Обрюзгший мужчина в потрепанной одежде грустно вздыхает над стаканом мутного пойла. Только когда он поднимает взгляд на вас, становится видно, какие у него большие, внимательные и очень печальные глаза, резко контрастирующие с неопрятным внешним видом.{/n} "Неужели кто-то хочет составить мне компанию?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The blubbery man in worn clothes is sighing sadly over a glass of murky booze. Only when he looks up at you do you notice his eyes — big, keen, and dispirited, a start contrast to his unkempt appearance.{/n} "Could it be that someone actually wishes to keep me company?"

{n}The blubbery man in worn clothes is sighing sadly over a glass of murky booze. Only when he looks up at you do you notice his eyes — big, keen, and dispirited, a start contrast to his unkempt appearance.{/n} "Could it be that someone actually wishes to keep me company?"

{n}The flabby man in worn clothes is sighing sadly over a glass of murky booze. Only when he looks up at you do you notice his eyes — large, piercing, and full of sorrow, a stark contrast to his unkempt appearance.{/n} "Could it be that someone actually wishes to keep me company?"

{n}The flabby man in worn clothes is sighing sadly over a glass of murky booze. Only when he looks up at you do you notice his eyes — large, piercing, and full of sorrow, a stark contrast to his unkempt appearance.{/n} "Could it be that someone actually wishes to keep me company?"

{n}The flabby man in worn clothes is sighing sadly over a glass of murky booze. Only when he looks up at you do you notice his eyes — large, piercing, and full of sorrow, a stark contrast to his unkempt appearance.{/n} "Could it be that someone actually wishes to keep me company?"

languages.text: {n}着古した服に身を包んだふくよかな男が、濁った酒を飲みながら悲しげにため息をついている。こちらを見上げた時に初めて彼の目を見た―大きく、鋭く、悲しみに満ちていて、身なりとは対照的な印象だ。{/n}「この哀れな私の話し相手になってくれるのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The flabby man in worn clothes is sighing sadly over a glass of murky booze. Only when he looks up at you do you notice his eyes — large, piercing, and full of sorrow, a stark contrast to his unkempt appearance.{/n} "Could it be that someone actually wishes to keep me company?"

traits.locale_text: {n}着古した服に身を包んだふくよかな男が、濁った酒を飲みながら悲しげにため息をついている。こちらを見上げた時に初めて彼の目を見た―大きく、鋭く、悲しみに満ちていて、身なりとは対照的な印象だ。{/n}「この哀れな私の話し相手になってくれるのか？」

languages.text: {n}这个穿着破旧衣服的憔悴男人，此刻正对着杯中浑浊的酒伤心叹气。当他抬头看着你时，你注意到了他的眼睛。那双大大的眼睛带着明锐的目光，却又充满悲伤，与他蓬头垢面的样子形成鲜明的对比。{/n}“莫非有谁打算和我聊聊吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The flabby man in worn clothes is sighing sadly over a glass of murky booze. Only when he looks up at you do you notice his eyes — large, piercing, and full of sorrow, a stark contrast to his unkempt appearance.{/n} "Could it be that someone actually wishes to keep me company?"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个穿着破旧衣服的憔悴男人，此刻正对着杯中浑浊的酒伤心叹气。当他抬头看着你时，你注意到了他的眼睛。那双大大的眼睛带着明锐的目光，却又充满悲伤，与他蓬头垢面的样子形成鲜明的对比。{/n}“莫非有谁打算和我聊聊吗？”

languages.text: {n}El hombre fofo y vestido con ropas harapientas suspira tristemente ante un vaso lleno de alguna bebida turbia. Solo cuando levanta la vista hacia ti te fijas en sus ojos: grandes, penetrantes y llenos de tristeza, en marcado contraste con su aspecto desaliñado.{/n} «¿Soy yo o es que alguien quiere hacerme compañía?».
languages.original_text: {n}The flabby man in worn clothes is sighing sadly over a glass of murky booze. Only when he looks up at you do you notice his eyes — large, piercing, and full of sorrow, a stark contrast to his unkempt appearance.{/n} "Could it be that someone actually wishes to keep me company?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre fofo y vestido con ropas harapientas suspira tristemente ante un vaso lleno de alguna bebida turbia. Solo cuando levanta la vista hacia ti te fijas en sus ojos: grandes, penetrantes y llenos de tristeza, en marcado contraste con su aspecto desaliñado.{/n} «¿Soy yo o es que alguien quiere hacerme compañía?».

languages.text: {n}L'homme flasque aux vêtements usés soupire d'un air triste, un verre d'alcool trouble à la main. Lorsqu'il lève le regard vers vous, vous remarquez de grands yeux perçants emplis de chagrin qui contrastent avec son apparence négligée.{/n} « Se pourrait-il que quelqu'un cherche à me tenir compagnie ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The flabby man in worn clothes is sighing sadly over a glass of murky booze. Only when he looks up at you do you notice his eyes — large, piercing, and full of sorrow, a stark contrast to his unkempt appearance.{/n} "Could it be that someone actually wishes to keep me company?"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme flasque aux vêtements usés soupire d'un air triste, un verre d'alcool trouble à la main. Lorsqu'il lève le regard vers vous, vous remarquez de grands yeux perçants emplis de chagrin qui contrastent avec son apparence négligée.{/n} « Se pourrait-il que quelqu'un cherche à me tenir compagnie ? »

languages.text: {n}Der untersetzte Mann in abgetragener Kleidung seufzt betrübt, in der Hand ein Glas trüben Alkohols. Erst als er zu dir aufblickt, bemerkst du seine Augen – groß, stechend und voller Trauer, ein starker Kontrast zu seinem ungepflegten Äußeren.{/n} "Wäre es möglich, dass mir tatsächlich jemand Gesellschaft leisten möchte?"
languages.original_text: {n}The flabby man in worn clothes is sighing sadly over a glass of murky booze. Only when he looks up at you do you notice his eyes — large, piercing, and full of sorrow, a stark contrast to his unkempt appearance.{/n} "Could it be that someone actually wishes to keep me company?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der untersetzte Mann in abgetragener Kleidung seufzt betrübt, in der Hand ein Glas trüben Alkohols. Erst als er zu dir aufblickt, bemerkst du seine Augen – groß, stechend und voller Trauer, ein starker Kontrast zu seinem ungepflegten Äußeren.{/n} "Wäre es möglich, dass mir tatsächlich jemand Gesellschaft leisten möchte?"

languages.text: {n}Sarkmış vücudunun üzerine yıpranmış kıyafetler giyen adam; elinde bulanık bir içki kadehi, hüzünle iç çekiyor. Başını kaldırıp da sana bakana dek gözlerini fark etmiyorsun. Hırpani görünümüne tam bir tezat oluşturan kocaman, delici, keder dolu gözler bunlar.{/n} "Sahiden de bana eşlik etmek isteyen biri mi var yoksa?"
languages.original_text: {n}The flabby man in worn clothes is sighing sadly over a glass of murky booze. Only when he looks up at you do you notice his eyes — large, piercing, and full of sorrow, a stark contrast to his unkempt appearance.{/n} "Could it be that someone actually wishes to keep me company?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sarkmış vücudunun üzerine yıpranmış kıyafetler giyen adam, bulanık görünüşlü bir kadeh içkiyi eline almış, hüzünle iç çekiyor. Başını kaldırıp sana baktığında, bakımsız görünümüne tam bir tezat oluşturan kocaman, keskin ve dertli gözlerini fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Acaba gerçekten benimle konuşmak isteyen birisi mi gelmiş?"
